module.name: XMPP
module.description: Manage and configure a XMPP Server Prosody and requires the Prosody RPM from your PBX be installed.
module.changelog: *13.0.19* FREEPBX-18403 *13.0.18* FREEPBX-18396 *13.0.17.15* FREEPBX-18077 User/Grp perms for XMPP not working correctly in userman *13.0.17.14* FREEPBX-18076 XMPP login fails silently if userman email address is not unique *13.0.17.13* FREEPBX-16988 *13.0.17.12* Version bump *13.0.17.11* Bump *13.0.17.10* Return uuid when listing room and room messages *13.0.17.9* Fix bug running script *13.0.17.8* Update to let's chat libraries *13.0.17.7* Update to let's chat libraries *13.0.17.6* Update to let's chat libraries *13.0.17.5* Update let's chat libraries *13.0.17.4* Check to make sure MongoDB has started after we tried *13.0.17.3* This is needed otherwise authentication is broken *13.0.17.2* Userman dep only works if fully defined *13.0.17.1* Update to require pm2 *13.0.17* Add email script for offline notifications *13.0.16.9* Require newest pm2 for proxy support *13.0.16.8* Dont write into npmrc file *13.0.16.7* FREEPBX-14620 invalid directory permissions *13.0.16.6* Fix starting mongoDB *13.0.16.5* Fixed Writing to the home directory as root *13.0.16.4* Logrotate fixes *13.0.16* Utilize new pm2 module *13.0.15.3* No -y option on rpm *13.0.15.2* Remove Prosody another way *13.0.15.1* FREEPBX-14384 *13.0.15* Replace Prosody with Lets Chat *13.0.14* Call Userman the BMO way *13.0.13* FREEPBX-12517 dont allow sending messages to self *13.0.12* Open Source Module: https://www.freepbx.org/sangomas-commitment-to-open-source/ *13.0.11* Support better chat interfaces *13.0.10* FREEPBX-12419 remove debug *13.0.9* No need to prompt to reenter password *13.0.8* Fix issue with users not getting saved *13.0.7* Password prompt instead of text *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10758 *13.0.5* Invalid foreach *13.0.4* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.3* Fix permission management in User Manager *13.0.2.3* FREEPBX-9818 daemon wont start *13.0.1alpha3* FREEPBX-9799 invalid reference *13.0.1alpha2* Fix issue with new strict error handler in 13 *13.0.1alpha1* Usermanager Groups *12.0.23* FREEPBX-8829 Support username changes *12.0.22* Executable flag set on bin *12.0.21* FREEPBX-8571 fix wsod in User Manager *12.0.20* Catch writing to the prosody database incase there are errors *12.0.19* Write out conf file if not licensed. *12.0.18* Report the real status of Prosody *12.0.17* Syntax *12.0.15* Xmpp reset password support through User manager and UCP *12.0.14* Better contact manager support *12.0.13* Add contact manager action *12.0.12* Dont double hide *12.0.11* Hide if not connected *12.0.10* Support for contact manager *12.0.9* Fix double, tripple, quadrupal messages in UCP *12.0.8* Dont show xmpp if its disabled *12.0.7* Use contact manager if present *12.0.6* Typing and presencestate in UCP *12.0.5* XMPP chat inside of UCP *12.0.4* FREEPBX-7976 Only show if services are running in dashboard if licensed *12.0.3* Xmpp Support in UCP *12.0.2* Permissions fixes *12.0.1* Move dashboard hooks into xmpp *2.11.1.15* Add one-to-many mappings for extensions on userman users. *2.11.1.14* Require rebuild of configs on module upgrade *2.11.1.13* Fix for upcoming userman module update *2.11.1.12* Handle AMI reconnect, fixing a resource consumption issue. *2.11.1.11* Fix rare usermanager preload error bug *2.11.1.8* Sales cleanup *2.11.1.7* Hide xmpp setting on user creation *2.11.1.6* Set dirty to true when deleting users *2.11.1.5* Change Username Fix *2.11.1.4* Instead of using internal functions just remove the user through SQL *2.11.1.3* UM Tweak *2.11.1.2* UM Tweak *2.11.1.1* UM Tweak *2.11.1.0* Now using User Manager *2.11.0.7* Add presence component, for managing presence state. *2.11.0.4* Add Assets Back *2.11.0.3* Fix issue with not updating MySQL password. *2.11.0.2* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.2 *2.11.0.1* Fix issue with sales page not showing *2.11.0.0* Bump for 2.11 *2.10.5.11* Add sales information *2.10.5.10* Generate password if non given on migration
